spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatch between 2D and 3D. Living room/dining room/kitchen zones are not clearly partitioned per plan and several boundaries/offsets do not align. The central stair core shown in the 2D plan is not represented as stairs in the 3D, causing the entire top-center circulation to be wrong. Door locations and swing/orientation do not match multiple openings in the plan. Window placement is largely absent/unclear compared to the numerous exterior windows indicated in the 2D. Room proportions (especially kitchen/dining depth and the top-center core) appear distorted.

structural_fidelity.notes: Key structural elements are missing or altered: the stair (with UP/DN) is not modeled; adjacency relationships around foyer/WC/stairs/kitchen do not match the plan. Several rooms appear merged/opened (dining vs kitchen; living vs foyer transitions) compared to the 2D wall layout. There are also added/altered wall shapes (curved/rounded partitioning) not supported by the 2D drawing. While wall thickness looks somewhat consistent, door embedding and the correctness of interior partitions are frequently incorrect.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not correspond to the 2D plan: a bed appears in the top-center area (not a bedroom in the plan), and a desk setup appears where the plan indicates playroom/kitchen-adjacent space. Kitchen cabinetry/appliance layout (sink/range/island) is not faithfully represented. Furniture scaling is only loosely plausible and not anchored to the plan’s fixture positions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Rendering is clean and readable with decent lighting and geometry. However, the camera is more perspective/isometric-like rather than a strict architectural isometric/orthographic presentation, and some wall/partition shaping (including curved elements) reduces plan-faithful clarity. Overall visually coherent but not technically precise.

detected_errors.description: Missing stair core (UP/DN stairs) shown at top-center of the 2D plan; replaced by non-stair space in 3D.
Hallucinated bedroom-like setup (bed/furnishing) in the top-center area where the 2D plan shows stairs/landing and adjacent small rooms, not a bedroom.
Kitchen fixture placement is incorrect/missing: the 2D plan indicates specific counters/sink/range/island positions that are not matched in the 3D render.
Dining room definition is missing/merged: the 2D plan shows a distinct dining room footprint at the bottom center; 3D reads as an undifferentiated open area.
Multiple door locations do not match the 2D plan (notably around the kitchen/dining connection and top-center core).
Door swing/orientation mismatches at several openings (door arcs/swing directions in 2D are not respected in 3D).
Windows indicated around the exterior perimeter in 2D are largely absent or not placed correctly/consistently in the 3D render.
Proportion distortion: relative sizes/depths of kitchen/dining and the top-center service/circulation zone differ noticeably from the 2D plan.
Hallucinated/unsupported curved wall/rounded partition element(s) not present in the rectilinear 2D plan.
